{{ govukPanel({ titleHtml: '${0:Application complete}', html: '${1:Your reference number
HDJ2123F}', headingLevel: ${2:1-6. Default: 1}, classes: '$3' }) }}$99

We have sent you a confirmation email.

What happens next

We’ve sent your application to Hackney Electoral Register Office.

They will contact you either to confirm your registration, or to ask for more information.

What did you think of this service? (takes 30 seconds)

{{ serviceName }}

Application incomplete

You have completed 3 of 8 sections.

  1. 1. Check before you start

    • Check eligibility {{ govukTag({ html: 'Completed', classes: 'app-task-list__tag' }) }} Completed
    • Read declaration {{ govukTag({ html: 'Completed', classes: 'app-task-list__tag' }) }}

  2. 2. Prepare application

    • Company information {{ govukTag({ html: 'Completed', classes: 'app-task-list__tag' }) }}
    • Your contact details {{ govukTag({ html: 'In progress', classes: 'govuk-tag--blue app-task-list__tag' }) }}
    • List convictions {{ govukTag({ html: 'Not started', classes: 'govuk-tag--grey app-task-list__tag' }) }}
    • Provide financial evidence {{ govukTag({ html: 'Cannot start yet', classes: 'govuk-tag--grey app-task-list__tag' }) }}
    • Give medical information {{ govukTag({ html: 'Cannot start yet', classes: 'govuk-tag--grey app-task-list__tag' }) }}

  3. 3. Apply

    • Submit and pay {{ govukTag({ html: 'Cannot start yet', classes: 'govuk-tag--grey app-task-list__tag' }) }}
